languages.text: Лишь элантах удерживал{mf||а} Ирлиэт среди мон-кай, но сердце ее было неспокойно, а душа кровоточила от перелетов сквозь варп. Все чаще она отлучалась на поиски камней душ, и поиски становились все дольше.

Her elantach was all that kept Yrliet among the mon-keigh, but her heart was restless, and her soul bled from journeys through the warp. Her lone expeditions in search of spirit stones grew longer and more frequent.
languages.original_text: Лишь элантах удерживал{mf||а} Ирлиэт среди мон-кай, но сердце ее было неспокойно, а душа кровоточила от перелетов сквозь варп. Все чаще она отлучалась на поиски камней душ, и поиски становились все дольше.

traits.locale_text: Elantach alone kept Yrliet among mon-keigh, but her heart was restless, and her soul bled during traverses through the warp. Her trips in search of spirit stones grew longer and more frequent.

Her elantach alone kept Yrliet among the mon-keigh, but her heart was restless, and her soul bled from journeys through the warp. Her quests in search of spirit stones grew longer and more frequent.

Her elantach was all that kept Yrliet among the mon-keigh, but her heart was restless, and her soul bled from journeys through the warp. Her lone expeditions in search of spirit stones grew longer and more frequent.

Her elantach was all that kept Yrliet among the mon-keigh, but her heart was restless, and her soul bled from journeys through the warp. Her lone expeditions in search of spirit stones grew longer and more frequent.

languages.text: 仅仅由于外界人的原因，伊莉耶特留在了猴子之间。然而，她的心灵却躁动不安，她的灵魂在穿越亚空间的旅途中不断流血。她孤身寻找灵魂石的旅途变得越来越久，次数也越来越频繁。
languages.original_text: Her elantach was all that kept Yrliet among the mon-keigh, but her heart was restless, and her soul bled from journeys through the warp. Her lone expeditions in search of spirit stones grew longer and more frequent.

traits.locale_text: 外界人坚持将伊莉耶特留在了猴子之间，但伊莉耶特的心灵却躁动不安，她的灵魂在穿越亚空间的旅途中不断滴血，冥想的时间越来越长，次数也越来越频繁。

languages.text: Nur ihr Elantach hielt Yrliet bei den Chem-Pan-Sey, doch ihr Herz war rastlos und ihre Seele blutete von den Reisen durch den Warp. Sie brach immer häufiger allein zu Expeditionen auf, um nach Seelensteinen zu suchen, und diese Expeditionen dauerten auch immer länger.
languages.original_text: Her elantach was all that kept Yrliet among the mon-keigh, but her heart was restless, and her soul bled from journeys through the warp. Her lone expeditions in search of spirit stones grew longer and more frequent.

traits.locale_text: Nur ihr Elantach hielt Yrliet bei den Chem-Pan-Sey, doch ihr Herz war rastlos und ihre Seele blutete von den Reisen durch den Warp. Ihre Expeditionen auf der Suche nach Seelensteinen wurden immer länger und immer regelmäßiger.

languages.text: Seule la perspective de suivre l'elantach incitait Yrliet à vivre parmi les mon-keigh, mais son cœur restait tourmenté et son âme saignait un peu plus à chaque voyage à travers le Warp. Ses expéditions solitaires pour obtenir des pierres-esprits se firent plus fréquentes et plus longues.
languages.original_text: Her elantach was all that kept Yrliet among the mon-keigh, but her heart was restless, and her soul bled from journeys through the warp. Her lone expeditions in search of spirit stones grew longer and more frequent.

traits.locale_text: Seule la perspective de suivre l'elantach incitait Yrliet à vivre parmi les mon-keigh, mais son cœur restait tourmenté et son âme saignait un peu plus à chaque voyage à travers le Warp. Ses quêtes pour obtenir des pierres-esprits se firent plus fréquentes et plus longues.

languages.text: Su elantach fue lo único que mantuvo a Yrliet entre los mon-keigh, pero su corazón permanecía intranquilo y su alma sangraba tras todos sus viajes por la disformidad. Sus expediciones solitarias en busca de joyas espirituales se volvieron cada vez más largas y frecuentes.
languages.original_text: Her elantach was all that kept Yrliet among the mon-keigh, but her heart was restless, and her soul bled from journeys through the warp. Her lone expeditions in search of spirit stones grew longer and more frequent.

traits.locale_text: Su elantach fue lo único que mantuvo a Yrliet entre los mon-keigh, pero su corazón permanecía intranquilo y su alma sangraba tras todos sus viajes por la disformidad. Sus búsquedas de joyas espirituales se volvieron cada vez más largas y frecuentes.

languages.text: ユリエットがモン＝ケイの中にとどまったのは、ひとえにエランタのためだった。だが彼女の心は休まらず、魂は歪みの旅を重ねて苦痛にあえいでいた。魂縛石探しの一人旅はさらに長くなり、頻繁に繰り返されるようになっていった。
languages.original_text: Her elantach was all that kept Yrliet among the mon-keigh, but her heart was restless, and her soul bled from journeys through the warp. Her lone expeditions in search of spirit stones grew longer and more frequent.

traits.locale_text: ユリエットがモン＝ケイの中にとどまったのは、ひとえにエランタのためだった。だが彼女の心は休まらず、魂は歪みの旅を重ねて苦痛にあえいでいた。魂縛石探しの一人旅はさらに長くなり、頻繁に繰り返されるようになっていった。

languages.text: Yrliet'i mon-keighler arasında tutan tek şey elantach'ı idi. Ancak yüreği huzursuz, ruhu ise öteboyutta yaptığı yolculuklar nedeniyle yaralıydı. Kendi başına ruh taşlarını aradığı keşif yolculukları giderek uzadı ve sıklaştı.
languages.original_text: Her elantach was all that kept Yrliet among the mon-keigh, but her heart was restless, and her soul bled from journeys through the warp. Her lone expeditions in search of spirit stones grew longer and more frequent.

traits.locale_text: Yrliet'i mon-keighler arasında tutan tek şey elantach'ı idi ancak yüreği huzursuz, ruhu ise öteboyutta yaptığı yolculuklar nedeniyle yaralıydı. Kendi başına ruh taşlarını aradığı keşif yolculukları giderek daha uzun hâle geldi ve sıklaştı.
